TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeViewCancelEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

summary.span: 提供 控制項的 、、 和 事件等資料。

span.span: Provides data for the , , , and events of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何變更的摺疊狀態，讓所有選取的節點會顯示。The following example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，會摺疊所有節點，並處理常式加入至事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added to the event. 接著，所有節點會展開。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件處理常式可讓您判斷指定的節點是否有簽入的子節點。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果節點沒有已檢查的子系，該節點的擴充而遭到取消。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 為了讓一般的節點展開，按一下節點旁邊的加號時，然後移除事件處理常式。In order to allow normal node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 這項行為也可以實作處理事件，該主題的範例所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 完整的範例，請參閱參考主題。For the complete example, see the reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1/CPP/treeviewshowcheckednodes1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1/CS/treeviewshowcheckednodes1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1/VB/treeviewshowcheckednodes1.vb#2)]

public: TreeViewCancelEventArgs(System::Windows::Forms::TreeNode ^ node, bool cancel, System::Windows::Forms::TreeViewAction action);

span.span: The that the event is responding to.

param.name: cancel
param.span: 若要取消事件，則為 ，否則為 。

param.name: action
param.span: 其中一個 值，表示引發事件的動作型別。

span.span: One of the values indicating the type of action that raised the event.

summary.span: 使用指定的樹狀節點、指定是否取消事件數值和引發事件的樹狀檢視動作型別，初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified tree node, a value specifying whether the event is to be canceled, and the type of tree view action that raised the event.

public: property System::Windows::Forms::TreeViewAction Action { System::Windows::Forms::TreeViewAction get(); };

summary.span: 取得引發事件的 動作型別。

span.span: Gets the type of action that raised the event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`TreeView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TreeView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#626](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#626)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#626](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#626)]

public: property System::Windows::Forms::TreeNode ^ Node { System::Windows::Forms::TreeNode ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得要核取、展開、摺疊或選取的節點。

span.span: Gets the tree node to be checked, expanded, collapsed, or selected.

value.span: 要核取、展開、收合或選取的 。

span.span: The to be checked, expanded, collapsed, or selected.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何變更的摺疊狀態，讓所有選取的節點會顯示。The following example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，會摺疊所有節點，並處理常式加入至事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added to the event. 接著，所有節點會展開。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件處理常式可讓您判斷指定的節點是否有簽入的子節點。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果節點沒有已檢查的子系，該節點的擴充而遭到取消。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 為了讓一般的節點展開，按一下節點旁邊的加號時，然後移除事件處理常式。In order to allow normal node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 這項行為也可以實作處理事件，該主題的範例所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 完整的範例，請參閱參考主題。For the complete example, see the reference topic.
